messages.title: Someone needs to stand up for our NHS and schools...
messages.content: NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in the independent study. Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years.

messages.title: ...and Labour is too busy fighting each other to stand up for them.
messages.content: Labour is fatally divided inside Parliament and outside it. 'We cannot fight and win with Jeremy as our leader.'

messages.title: WHO WILL REALLY FIGHT FOR OUR NHS?
messages.content: The Lib Dems have a clear plan... The Liberal Democrats will deliver for our NHS and schools. VOTE LIBERAL DEMOCRAT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to introduce a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of the country the Conservatives can't win this time - it's Lib Dem or Labour.

issues.education: Lib Dems pledge to spend twice as much on education as Labour.
issues.health: NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in the independent study.

quotes.text: NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in the independent study.
Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years.
The Liberal Democrats have pledged to introduce a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.
Labour is fatally divided inside Parliament and outside it.
We cannot fight and win with Jeremy as our leader.

images.caption: VOTE FOR THE PARTY THAT WILL DELIVER FOR OUR NHS AND SCHOOLS.
Lib Dems in government would guarantee the future funding of our NHS and schools.
